title: The Lightning Thief
author: Rick Riordan
notes_1: Development for The Lightning Thief began when author Rick Riordan made up stories for his son Haley
notes_2: While he gave his manuscript to his agent and editor to review, Riordan took his book to a group of middle schoolers to critique
notes_3: Riordan first sent out the manuscript for The Lightning Thief under the pseudonym Ransom Reese as he didn't want to rely on anyone in the publisher industry

title: The Sea of Monsters
author: Rick Riordan
notes_1: Percy Jackson has been having nightmares about Grover, the first involving him running from an unseen force and taking refuge in a wedding dress shop

title: Sophie's World : The Greek Philosophers
author: Jostein Gaarder
notes_1: As Albert Knag continues to meddle with Sophie's life, Alberto helps her fight back by teaching her everything he knows about philosophy
notes_2: Sophie, without the knowledge of her mother, becomes the student of an old philosopher, Alberto Knox
notes_3: In 1999 it was made into a board game by Robert Hyde and Ken Howard, and published by Sophisticated Games Ltd.
notes_4: The 1999 movie was also presented as an eight-part TV series in Australia and Iceland, again scripted by Petter Skavlan.

title: Lucene in Action, Second Edition
author: Michael McCandless
notes_1: When Lucene first appeared, this superfast search engine was nothing short of amazing.
notes_2: This totally revised book shows you how to index your documents

title: Apache Solr Essentials
author: Andrea Gazzarini
notes_1: Apache Solr Essentials is a fast-paced guide to help you quickly learn the process of creating a scalable, efficient, and powerful search application
notes_3: By the end of this book, you will be able to create excellent search applications with the help of Solr.
